thread.title: Student Suspended for Patriotic Shirt | Opinion - Conservative
thread.title_full: Student Suspended for Patriotic Shirt | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Student Suspended for Patriotic Shirt | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
What the hell kind of country are government schools socially engineering? From Gresham, Oregon :
No one who would equate fallen American soldiers with mass-murdering maniacs is in a position to be educating others.
Since Alan Holmes isn’t from an aggressively Islamist Sudanese family, and he didn’t bring a fake bomb to school, his suspension is unlikely to result in any invitations to the White House.
On a tip from Bill T.
